item.title: Dumping at bus stop BAD, 29th September
item.description:
Someone has started dumping at the bus stop. This is the second time this has happened now the first time they dumped and there’s a lot of nappies in their rubbish so the foxes are tearing it open and stepping it across the street. It is now being pulled into our garden by the foxes and I’m having to pick up somebody’s dirty diapers. It is not happened again now they’ve offloaded two rubbish bags and as you can see it’s been pulled into our garden for me to pick up. This is absolutely unhygienic and unsanitary and disgusting. Why is there no bin at the at the bus stop? This has to be picked up immediately and in addition there should not be happening in the first place. I’ve lived here for several years. This has not been happening before what is happening to this community? that suddenly we’ve got this kind of fly tipping occurring it’s not in the foot spice next to our house and also suddenly in front of our house Eltham is going down the drain where all the street cleaners.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westhorne Avenue, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooding in basement, 29th September
item.description:
The rain water in the soakaways is flooding at the bottom of houses - there are 5 soakways in middle of the road and its not going down the last soakaway in the street is not taking water away and its causing the basements to flood
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Yew Tree Close, East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large black tag graffiti ‘Lone’ sprayed onto the side of a block of flats, 29th September
item.description:
Over the weekend a number of ‘Lone’ black and white gang tags have been sprayed on walls and fences in Hackney and Haringey. Please can this, which appears to be the largest tag cleaned of the wall before further gang tags appear. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rowley Gardens, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter everywhere, 29th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Hadrian Street, East Greenwich, London

item.title: Clissold Crescent flytipping next to allotments, 29th September
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clissold Crescent, Hackney, London
